text: <a href="../1-Chronicles-15-1/" title="1 Chronicles 15:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 And *David* made him houses in the city of David, and prepared a place for the ark of God, and pitched for it a tent.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-2/" title="1 Chronicles 15:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 Then David said, None ought to carry the ark of God but the Levites: for them hath the LORD chosen to carry the ark of God, and to minister unto him for ever.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-3/" title="1 Chronicles 15:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 And David gathered all Israel together to Jerusalem, to bring up the ark of the LORD unto his place, which he had prepared for it.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-4/" title="1 Chronicles 15:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 And David assembled the children of Aaron, and the Levites:
<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-5/" title="1 Chronicles 15:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 Of the sons of Kohath; Uriel the chief, and his brethren an hundred and twenty:
<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-6/" title="1 Chronicles 15:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 Of the sons of Merari; Asaiah the chief, and his brethren two hundred and twenty:
<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-7/" title="1 Chronicles 15:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 Of the sons of Gershom; Joel the chief, and his brethren an hundred and thirty:
<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-8/" title="1 Chronicles 15:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 Of the sons of Elizaphan; Shemaiah the chief, and his brethren two hundred:
<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-9/" title="1 Chronicles 15:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 Of the sons of Hebron; Eliel the chief, and his brethren fourscore:
<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-10/" title="1 Chronicles 15:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 Of the sons of Uzziel; Amminadab the chief, and his brethren an hundred and twelve.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-11/" title="1 Chronicles 15:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 And David called for Zadok and Abiathar the priests, and for the Levites, for Uriel, Asaiah, and Joel, Shemaiah, and Eliel, and Amminadab,

<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-12/" title="1 Chronicles 15:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 And said unto them, Ye *are* the chief of the fathers of the Levites: sanctify yourselves, *both* ye and your brethren, that ye may bring up the ark of the LORD God of Israel unto *the place that* I have prepared for it.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-13/" title="1 Chronicles 15:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 For because ye *did it* not at the first, the LORD our God made a breach upon us, for that we sought him not after the due order.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-14/" title="1 Chronicles 15:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 So the priests and the Levites sanctified themselves to bring up the ark of the LORD God of Israel.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-15/" title="1 Chronicles 15:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 And the children of the Levites bare the ark of God upon their shoulders with the staves thereon, as Moses commanded according to the word of the LORD.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-16/" title="1 Chronicles 15:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 And David spake to the chief of the Levites to appoint their brethren *to be* the singers with instruments of musick, psalteries and harps and cymbals, sounding, by lifting up the voice with joy.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-17/" title="1 Chronicles 15:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 So the Levites appointed Heman the son of Joel; and of his brethren, Asaph the son of Berechiah; and of the sons of Merari their brethren, Ethan the son of Kushaiah;

<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-18/" title="1 Chronicles 15:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18 And with them their brethren of the second *degree*, Zechariah, Ben, and Jaaziel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Unni, Eliab, and Benaiah, and Maaseiah, and Mattithiah, and Elipheleh, and Mikneiah, and Obededom, and Jeiel, the porters.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-19/" title="1 Chronicles 15:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19 So the singers, Heman, Asaph, and Ethan, *were appointed* to sound with cymbals of brass;

<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-20/" title="1 Chronicles 15:20 KJV verse detail"><span id="22" class="versehover">20 And Zechariah, and Aziel, and Shemiramoth, and Jehiel, and Unni, and Eliab, and Maaseiah, and Benaiah, with psalteries on Alamoth;

<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-21/" title="1 Chronicles 15:21 KJV verse detail"><span id="23" class="versehover">21 And Mattithiah, and Elipheleh, and Mikneiah, and Obededom, and Jeiel, and Azaziah, with harps on the Sheminith to excel.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-22/" title="1 Chronicles 15:22 KJV verse detail"><span id="24" class="versehover">22 And Chenaniah, chief of the Levites, *was* for song: he instructed about the song, because he *was* skilful.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-23/" title="1 Chronicles 15:23 KJV verse detail"><span id="25" class="versehover">23 And Berechiah and Elkanah *were* doorkeepers for the ark.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-24/" title="1 Chronicles 15:24 KJV verse detail"><span id="26" class="versehover">24 And Shebaniah, and Jehoshaphat, and Nethaneel, and Amasai, and Zechariah, and Benaiah, and Eliezer, the priests, did blow with the trumpets before the ark of God: and Obededom and Jehiah *were* doorkeepers for the ark.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-25/" title="1 Chronicles 15:25 KJV verse detail"><span id="27" class="versehover">25 So David, and the elders of Israel, and the captains over thousands, went to bring up the ark of the covenant of the LORD out of the house of Obededom with joy.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-26/" title="1 Chronicles 15:26 KJV verse detail"><span id="28" class="versehover">26 And it came to pass, when God helped the Levites that bare the ark of the covenant of the LORD, that they offered seven bullocks and seven rams.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-27/" title="1 Chronicles 15:27 KJV verse detail"><span id="29" class="versehover">27 And David *was* clothed with a robe of fine linen, and all the Levites that bare the ark, and the singers, and Chenaniah the master of the song with the singers: David also *had* upon him an ephod of linen.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-28/" title="1 Chronicles 15:28 KJV verse detail"><span id="30" class="versehover">28 Thus all Israel brought up the ark of the covenant of the LORD with shouting, and with sound of the cornet, and with trumpets, and with cymbals, making a noise with psalteries and harps.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-15-29/" title="1 Chronicles 15:29 KJV verse detail"><span id="31" class="versehover">29 And it came to pass, *as* the ark of the covenant of the LORD came to the city of David, that Michal the daughter of Saul looking out at a window saw king David dancing and playing: and she despised him in her heart.
